import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import index from './images/indexbanner.jpg'; import me from './images/me.jpg'; const About = () => { return (

Equipmaster

An addon to automate gear equipping in the game. To use it simply open your character frame and click the Button with the arrow facing down. The addon will scan your bags and equip the highest item level gear you can use.

BuildaPCVR

VRBuildaPC is a VR PC building simulator designed to provide users with a comprehensive and engaging learning experience in assembling a computer. Users will step into a virtual workshop equipped with lifelike components, tools, and step-by-step guides to simulate the process of building a PC from scratch.

Bok Choy

In the adventure game Bok Choy Adventure, players will follow Amara, a young adventurer lost on a mysterious and visually stunning island after a deadly shipwreck. The game delivers a truly engaging experience, immersing players in a rich and dynamic world filled with exciting secrets waiting to be revealed.

Neon Nights

The game is a cyberpunk RPG set in a dystopian future where players take on the role of a street-wise hacker trying to survive in a world of corrupt corporations, ruthless gangs, and high-tech weaponry. The game's UI should be designed to create a sense of urban grittiness and high-tech innovation, with a sleek and stylized design.

EcoConnect Mobile App

EcoConnect is a mobile app designed to encourage and facilitate sustainable living by connecting individuals within local communities. The app aims to promote eco-friendly practices.

); }; export default About;
